body.p: The undersigned Citizens of Nicholas County would respectfully Petition Your Excellency to release Leonard Sheilds and William Miller who are now confined in the State Prison at Frankfort. They were sentenced to four Years imprisonment each by the Nicholas Circuit Court at its March term 1865 for horse stealing.

We would not presume to Petition for the release of a hardened reprobate, but we do think and feel that Sheilds and Miller are deserving objects of Executive Clemency: Sheilds has a wife and three little children in a helpless and destitute condition. It would certainly be an act of humanity to discharge him; and we feel satisfied that if Your Excellency will excersize the pardoning power in his case he will thence forward be a good orderly citizen. we also feel authorized to make the same statements in reference to Miller. Hoping Your Excellency will grant our prayer we are very truly Your fellow Citizens

W T Piper
G. W Adair
